subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Volvo Ocean Race
lead_paragraph: Team Telefónica of Spain extended its lead in the Volvo Ocean Race after its victory off Cape Town in the second in-port race after its victory in the first leg.
snippet: Team Telefónica of Spain extended its lead in the Volvo Ocean Race after its victory off Cape Town in the second in-port race after its victory in the first leg.
